shortdesc.ph: Used to configure advanced options for video encoding.
Used to configure advanced options for video encoding.

plentry.pd: Compression preference setting for video encoding. See .

Whether to encode and send Alpha data in the video frame:
: Encode and send Alpha data.
: (default) Do not encode or send Alpha data.
Compression preference setting for video encoding. See .

Whether to encode and send alpha data in the video frame to the remote:
: Encode and send alpha data.
(default): Do not encode or send alpha data.
